Blog.post: aaahhh...im s0o0o tired!! lol...but i had a fun weekend, n i jus g0t bac las nite like r0und...10...n den im leavin again 2m0r!! haha...yay!! sat - went 2 dis 1 mall, hella tite. g0t s0m stuff n den i went n ate yup...g0n fr0m h0me da WHOLE day((thank g0d!!))...den i went n rented 50 first dates. g00d m0vie, made me laugh. sun - went t0 church in da m0rnin...saw s0m fine guys i hadnt seen in 4eva...yeh yeh!! haha...n den rite afta church i was walkin 0ut w. nickie, n i tripped n i was like O0OH SHIT!! oopsies...... but yeh den nickie came 0va mah h0use, den we went 2 da m0vies n saw a cinderella st0ry...it was cute. den, we didnt wanna g0 h0me yet, s0 we went walkin r0und dis place by derr n i swear...we like alm0st g0t raped lol...we were like AAAAHHH!! but it was fun i gues lol. den we went bac 2 mah h0use, n den we went 0va nickies h0use, had margaritas, n i spent da nite derr. M0nDay - i was at nickies...hmm...oh yeh! we went 2 da m0vies n saw The N0teb00k...it was s0o0o0o g00d. like 1 of da best m0vies i*ve seen. yup. den, we went 2 mc d0nalds, den we went bac 2 her h0use. den mah m0m came 0va f0r a lil...yeh, umm...den nickies m0m made margaritas s0 we had d0se again lol. den we stayed up till like 430 in da m0rnin, n i was like laughin f0r n0 reas0n at all lol. den nickie started scarrin me n shit haha...g00d times. TuES - i was still at nickies h0use lol. we went 2 da anti0ch mall, chilled derr f0r a while((s0o0o many h0t buys again!! lol)). den, we went bac 2 her h0use, ate, den we went 2 TJ Max bcuz it was on da way 2 mah h0use. den we went 2 mah h0use stayed derr till like...11 den nickie had 2 g0. 2day...has been kinda b0ring lol. i jus g0t up, f0lded da t0wels n clothes n put dem away, emptied da dishwasher n put dirrty dishes inside, cleaned mah r00m...n dats pretty much it! lol...but i gta pack bcuz 2m0r im leaving f0r................................................... DiSnEyLaNd!!

i am...s0o0o mad rite n0w!! gRrRr...i was SuPp0SeD t0 g0 t0 Disneyland w. all mah friends, but as usual...s0mthin aLwYz hasta g0 wr0ng. mah dad didn*t want me t0 g0 since there*s g0nna b n0 chaper0nes n we*re g0in w. guys. s0 mah m0m went l00kin f0r 0ther things f0r me t0 g0 t0 n she was like instead 0f g0ing t0 disneyland, y0u can g0 t0 *CaNcUn* 0r *0rLaNd0 Fl0RiDa*. s0 i was like umm...0k dat s0unds fun. s0 i was like 0k, g0ing to 0rLaNd0 w. nickie wuld b t0tally fun bcuz derrs disney world, AND the beach. s0 what d0es my dad d0?? he calls n makes reservations for me n nickie...but also himself, my m0m, n nickies wh0le family. s0 n0w, nickie and me r stuk w. da wh0le family which isn*t g0ing t0 be t0 fun. o well...im glad we get t0 g0 t0 florida th0. but i HELLA wanted t0 g0 t0 disneyland w. all mah friends!! it wulda been s0o0o much fun!! n i wuldnt have mah parents there. i*ve been w. dem ALLLL summer!! o well...derrs relly n0thin i can d0 b0ut it. s0 yeh i gues in like...2 weeks im g0in t0 fl0rida...w. 0ut all mah friends, n mah wh0le family...FUN!... yesterday n today have been pretty...b0ring((as usual)). but i*ve been d0in l0tta thnkn b0ut s0m1...n it sux s0o0o much!! i went 0ut w. dis guy 4 a while, n like he treated me s0 g00d n n0w i l00k bac at it, n i feel like i was jus a t0tal bitch t0 him s0mtimes. pe0ple wuld tell me aLL dis stuff b0ut him wen we were g0in 0ut n shit...n stupid me, i believed it n st0pped likin him. wut made it even w0rse was dat i didnt even break up w. him wen i l0st feelings. s0 den i finally br0ke w. him, l0tta things happened n we wernt talkin...yeh but t0 make a RELLY l0ng st0ry sh0rt, we r...relly g00d friends n0w, n im relly glad...except im startin t0 miss him. like we ALWYZ talk n weneva we hang 0ut we have s0o0o much fun 2gether. n he makes it seem s0...i dunn0 h0w t0 say it but its like...jus weird. n s0o0o many pe0ple r like yeh y0u 2 are g0n bac 2getha n blah blah blah. but i dunn0. it jus kinda feels like he messes w. mah head s0mtimes n he confuses me s0 much. i kinda regret g0in 0ut w. him...like i feel like we were kinda rushed int0 gettin 2gether but yeh. like if we had waited n g0n 0ut maybe a little later, mayb we still w0ulda been 2gether. but i dunno, i gues its jus made me realize dat wen it c0ms 2 guys...there is no 2nd chance...n it sux so much. but newayz...besides all dat...kinda g00d news i gues lol. me n mah nickie mite b able t0 g0 t0 disneyland w. da pe0ple fr0m 0akland we kn0w fr0m dance...if we g0 it sh0uld b HELLLA fun!! no parents, LOTTA fine guys...n den 0ur friends...wut culd b better?? n wed b derr 4 like...5 days...s0unds fun t0 me! n den wen we c0m bac, after like...3 days, we*re g0in d0wn s0uth again...but 0ur parents*LL b derr((grrrr...)). but im pretty sure we*LL jus walk r0und w.0ut dem lol. but wen we d0 g0, we*re g0nna g0 t0 L0ng beach...omg i LOOOVE it derr!! derrs southcoast plaze sh0pping center...dat place is s0o0o damn big!! yup...n den we*re g0nna g0 t0 Universal Studi0s...dat*LL b fun 2. n den we*re g0nna g0 t0 San Diego n jus chiLL r0und da beach...yay!! we*re g0n g0 b0dy b0ardin n shit...s0o0o much fun, but y0u get s0 many bruises...o well. yup so it shuld b fun. xOx.*.LaUrEn.*.xOx

w0w...2day was s0o0o...b0ring!! i was supp0sed t0 g0 t0 SaNTa CruZ, but mah m0mmaS bac was b0therin her. o0oh well. s0 yeh i was pretty much stuck at h0me, d0in n0thin n aLL mah friends culdnt d0 nethin eitha...which suked. mmmhmmm... YeSterRdaY...was pretty fun. i went 0ut w. mah m0m bcuz she had 2 find s0m things...in *PiTTsBuRg* daaamn...s0o0o many fine guys!! LoL...den afta dat...we went 0va 2 mah cuzins in *AnTi0cH*...m0re guyS...aLL his damn neighb0rs r s0o0o h0t lol. den afta we*re drivin h0me, n mah m0m 0uTTa n0where is like y0u wanna learn t0 drive?? i was like...umm...0k. s0 yeh she t00k me into this big empty parking l0t n had me drive r0und. den she t00k me h0me, n den mah dad t00k me driving...n i aLm0sT crashed mah m0m*s car...o0ops! yup...s0 den at like...8:30 0r s0mthin, *ChRiS* caLLs me n is like yeh...im by yr h0use y0u wanna kick it?? s0 mah m0m was like yeh he can c0m 0va.so he came 0va...dad wasnt 2 happy b0ut it...o well...hes gta get 0va it. s0 newayz mah parents were upstairs n we were jus...d0wnstairs watchin TV 0r w/e lol. so den we g0t pretty b0red n we were g0n g0 0ut n we were drivin, den his LiL br0tha caLLs him n is like yeh umm...i need y0u t0 c0m pik me up n0w. n chris was like yr still at da park rite?? lol...his br0tha is like nah im at s0m1's h0use, buh i dunn0 where i am...lol dat was greeat. yeh s0 den chris had 2 take me h0me t0 g0 find his br0tha...but its kewl...we can jus kick it s0m 0tha time. s0 i g0 h0me 0r w/e n like mah dad was kinda...weird lol but n0w its kewl...i d0n gta w0rry b0ut him trippin wen guys wanna c0m 0va!! yeh yeh...FINALLY!! s0 yeh...umm...d0n thnk i did nethin else. but i was s0o0o happy i g0t t0 see chris!! i hadnt SEEN him since dis greek festival we went 2 which was like...2 M0NTHS AGO!! buh yeh...derrs gta b m0re damn festivals...s0 much fun. but yeh i cant thnk 0f nethin else rite n0w...... -xOx-hUgS & kiSSeS-xOx-

LoL)). den we went swimmin n i g0t hella b0red so i jus like started prank callin dis 1 guy dats like a total jerk buh w/e. den i went h0me n i WANTED t0 g0 sLeep early bcuz i had 2 get up early da next day...buh i culdnt bcuz every1 kept caLLin me. den i finaLLy go 2 sleep, n *j3r3my* caLLs me... ***HaPpY 4th 0f JuLy!!*** 0k...s0 t0day was preTTy fun. I went t0 Suisun City w. mah m0m n mah dad. we went n ate at this place called Athenian GriLL. iT was pretty g00d i gues. Then we jusT Like waLked r0und ova derr...n i got s0m stuff. s0 it was a pretty g00d day. s0 after we came h0me, mah m0m teLLs me dis thing came in da mail f0r me yesterday...s0mthin bout entering into the Miss Teenage Calif0rnia Sc0Larship Pageant. s0 yeh mah m0m wants me t0 d0 it bcuz she thinx i*LL d0 g00d in it. im n0t shure if i wanna d0 it th0 but i g0tta make up mah mind fast bcuz all da paperwork n 0tha stuff needs t0 be in bef0re July 31st. mmhmm...s0 dats aLL dat happened t0day...buh i mite go 0ut lata...dunno th0. aight well ima b0unce... xOx.*.Lauren.*.xOx

h3y h3y...s0 yeh...this is mah first blog. Today was pretty...b0riNg!! ugh...jus got up did som stuff ar0und da house n den went to som book stores w. mah m0m((yeh...dat was REEELLY fun...))n on da way there all she did was lecture me bout summer sch00l...wow...that was preeetty interestin. 0tha then that...didnt do nethin lol. Yesterday was pretty fun tho((well...kinda)). I went ova mah friend cecilys house like round 1...den jeremy came. So jeremy jus kinda sat derr for a while bcuz cecily and me were gettin redy bcuz we were gon take pics at da mall. So cecilys sis t00k us n we went n t00k da pics. de were aight i gues...but da poses da lady made us do were like aLLL da same but w/e its kewl. s0 then we got hungry n decided t0 g0 t0 mcdonalds. lol...jeremy n me had a f00d fite w. the stupid fries. haha...den there were dese guys in derr that cecily thot were hot so i went ova derr n i was like yeh mah friend ova derr thnx u guys r h0t. lol den i left. they prolly th0t i was crazy but o well i don care. oh yeh...i saw LeXi n aLySSa derr t0 ((aww...i luv em! lol))...n we saw miLaN derr t0 dat was kewl i hadnt seen her in HELLA days. mmmhmmm...yeh dats wen mah day started gettin bad... mah m0m called me n was HELLA piSSed bcuz i wasnt d0in g00d in summa sc00L. but she was heLLa trippin its jus summa sc00L i d0n even gta go 2 it. so she was all yeh well ima b pikin up from mah way home from work n don ask t0 stay L0nger n den she hung up 0n me. mah mom w0uLda been at mah friends house at like 515 n it was alredy like 4 so i was like daaamn. but den we went 0utside n i got mah m0m t0 lemme stay tiLL like 8 so it was kewl. THEN...we decided t0 g0 swimming. so i was changin rite...n jeremy jus like WALKS in n im jus wearin mah th0ng so i was like 0mg!...lol so i was like yellin at him t0 get 0ut but he jus came in again but den he left. s0 yeh we g0 t0 da p00L n im wearin mah shorts on t0p of mah bathing suit n jeremy jus like picks me up n thr0ws me in...i was s0o0o mad at him!! lol...but den i t00k his shirt n threw it in so u n0e i was aight afta dat lol. so den it was me, jeremy, cecily, justine((cec cuz)) in da p00L n aLL da gurLs were trynna pants jeremy lol...but i was da 1 dat ended up gettin pantsd...AGAIN lol. yeh so we were jus d0in weird shit at da p00L lol...yeeh...so den we went bac 2 cec h0use n like i dunn0 wut cec was d0in lol so like jeremy n me were jus fightin like we alwyz do...so den like i sLapped his a$$ 4 pantsin me...well i sLapped it c0upLe of times lol. so den me n jeremy r in like da famiLy r00m n he sLaPs mah a$$ HEEELLLA hard!! i was like DAAAMN lol. but yeh newayz we jus hung out at her h0use... den mah parents piked me up n mah m0m was jus hella pissed still n yeh i don wanna get into dat... well yeh ima g0 n0w... ~~~>LaUr3n<~~~

Yesterday i went 2 *Carmel* with nickie, mah mom n nickie*s mom. it was pretty fun. on the way down there we went the wrong way lol, n we somhow found this mission so we jus decided 2 go in. it was actually relly nice inside. n wen we were goin outside from the older church, we saw a bride n she was getting married there. it was a relly cute wedding. so then we left the mission n we got hungry so we decided 2 go eat. we went 2 dis one place n there food was relly good there. lol...n the busboy/waitor was hElLa hitting on nickie n me lol. so then our moms left n it was jus nickie n me n we both had 2 use da bathroom relly bad lol, n there was jus 1 so while nickie was in the bathroom, i was standin outside waiting or w/e n da busboy/waitor guy was jus sitting there starring at me like the wHoOoLe time, lol...n den i culdnt help it n i jus like busted out laughing lol. so den he came ova n he was standing rite in front of me jus starrin at me n i was jus like WTF?? lol n den rite wen nickie was comin outta da bathroom he was all so, where u from gurl?? n i was still kinda laughin n i was like umm..the bay area n he was like oh so oakland?? n i was like yup. so den i went in da bathroom or w/e n wen was washing my hands i heard nickie hella laughing n i was like o god is he jus sittin derr starrin at her 2?? lol so i go outside n shes like omg i hella gotta tell you somthin. so we*re leaving n da guy says bye 2 me, n nickie starts laughin even more n i was like umm...ok. so we get outside n nickie was like yeh while you were in da bathroom he came up 2 me n told me 2 tell you yr cute n i was like wth?? i dunno it was jus kinda weird lol. so newayz...we ended up going 2 da beach n there was ANOTHA wedding!! lol. i didnt relly watch dat 1 dat much tho lol. so yeh den nickie n me were jus walking on da beach n we got s0o0o wet n it was FREEZING outside!! n we saw 2 sea otters!! lol so yeh we had a fun day...i relly cant memmer nethin else rite now. but yeh we didnt com home till like round 10 at nite. ¸.•*¸.•* ¸.•* ¸.•* ¸.•* B A B Y¸.•* ¸.•* G I R L ¸.•* ¸.•*¸.•* ¸.•* ¸.•*

aaahhh...i am s0o0o tired!! i havnt like slept since last tuesday nite!! but i had SOOO much fun at disneyland!! yup... thursday - we left oakland at r0und 830 in the m0rnin. in da van it was me, nickie, denise, michelle, akanksha, eliana, krystina, kendra n alex. it was cRaZy!! lol. but it was hella fun. haha...denise did a summersault in da van s0mh0w h0ly shit dat was hilarious!! lol n krystina was flashin people...alex m00ned a trucker, n da 2 0tha vans lol. we were tlkn 2 pe0ple 0n da freeway, we had our ***h0nK iF y0uR h0rNy*** n ***Sh0w mE y0uR SeXy SmiLe*** signs. haha...it was fun. den we FINALLY g0t derr, n at nite we went 2 calif0rnia adventure n disneyland...so much fun!! but we had 2 like st0p s0mwhere every 5 minutes s0 alex culd sm0ke, but its kewl. den dat nite we g0t bac 2 0ur r00ms at like 1230, n it was me nickie amanda n tasha n we were STARVING. s0 we ended up g0ing 2 dennys at...1 in da m0rnin lol. w0w...we had a pretty interestin time in derr lol...l0tta funni shit. s0 yeh we ate 0r w/e den we were wlkn bac 2 da h0tel n there was a friggin rat 0n da sidewalk n we all started SCREAMING n we jus ran accr0ss da street lol. n derr were these guys f0ll0win us...tasha nickie n me th0t de were hella fine lol. n OMG amanda was like eww d0nt talk 2 them derr ni99ers...dat HELLA pissed me off omg. so i was like grr...well fuk y0u. but yeh w/e so dat was dat. FriDay- on friday in da daytime nickie n me were jus hangin 0ut w. andrew, pan0 n j0nny. we had s0 much fun...de were s0o0o funni!! lol. n den we went n ate gumbo. i had never had dat b4, but it was relly g00d. den after like, 2 h0urs we f0und summ0r ppl fr0m oakland lol so it was: me nickie andrew pano j0nny angela nick n christo. n we jus like walked r0und n went 0n rides n stuff yeh yeh...it was fun. den dat nite, all of us went 0ut 2 dinner 2gether 2 h0use 0f blues. it was ok derr...n0thin special. but 0ur bill at da end was $357!! n den we were $22 sh0rt lol...but we all paid m0re since 0tha ppl left, but w/e its aight. den dat nite it was me nickie angela pan0 andrew n j0nny n we jus kicked it at disneyland. oh yeh, n den dennis came dat nite 2 s0 we g0t 2 c him. n den after dat, we went 2 da h0tel n jus kicked it there, went 2 sleep n dats it lol. SaTuRdaY - s0 saturday every1 jus kinda went 0ff by themselves so nickie n me were jus like ok we*re leaving lol. s0 we jus walked r0und, went 0n hella rides. n den 4 lunch we went 2 dis 1 place called Arielles Gr0tti. OMG it was S0O0O cute derr!! wen we were eating s0m characters wuld c0m r0und n like hug y0u while y0u were eating n stuff. n derr was a lil parade derr lol...it was funni, n cute. den arielle came!! lol...i love arielle. n den i d0n memmer wut else we did dat day lol. but at nite time, we went sh0pping at d0wnt0wn disney. it was pretty fun. n den derr were dese HELLA fine guys n nickie was hella starrin at dem n den she crashed int0 all dese ppl!! lol it was hella funni. n den dis 0tha guy came up bhind me n was like mmm...i wanna tap dat ass!! n i was like umm...lol n den nickie was hella laughin at me n yeh. den we went 2 da h0tel, stayed up till...430 in da m0rnin, even th0 we had 2 get up at 6 2 get redy 2 drive 2 camarillo, n i hadnt packed yet lol. SuNdaY - so we didnt hear da wake up call, didnt hear da alarm on mah f0ne g0 0ff, n i s0mh0w w0ke up at 7 n i was like OH SHIT!! n i jumped outta bed n woke every1 up bcuz we had 2 leave in a damn h0ur lol. but yeh s0mh0w we were all redy 0n time. s0 we dr0ve 2 camarill0, went 2 church, n den all of us were in da parking l0t trynna change 0ut 0f 0ur church cl0thes int0 0ur regular cl0thes w. da music blasted lol. den we went 2 santa barbara festival...HELLA b0ring!! derr was seriously n0thin 2 d0 s0 all of us were like, hella pissed bcuz we wanted it 2 b a g00d festival lol. den all of us piled int0 1 of da vans, n da infinity. i was in da infinity, n in da bac it was: me dennis georgie demi nickie andrew nick christo n pan0 lol. s0 newayz we left da festival n we dr0ve h0me lol. o0oh yeh!! we st0pped at in-n-0ut, n nick g0t a 10 by 10((10 patties lol)) n he ate da WHOOOLE thing!! s0 we finally g0t 2 0akland, nickies br0ther picked us up n dennis 2. lol den nickies br0 missed da exit 4 mah h0use, s0 g0t l0st 4 a lil. but den i finally g0t h0me. yeh s0 disneyland was relly, relly, relly fun, but i havnt slept 4 like such a long time!! lol. n i dunn0 if we*re still g0nna g0 d0wn s0uth in a c0uple days lol. -xOx-xOx-
